data.message: My friends facebook page was hacked and as a result FB suspended the account, how does she get the page un-suspended? The help section is no help - need a phone number to call or someone to help!!

replies.message: Hey Cathy. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2fVcPMx to get immediate help. You can also encourage them to visit Privacy Basics at http://bit.ly/2fN0qLf for tips and guides to help them keep their account secure. -Joe
We did but the suspension still is not lifted - how does she get it lifted by facebook?
